One

Ryder Everything was better on [a private plane]186-a private plane . Flying private was n’t something [the British aristocracy]187-the british aristocracy did . [[My]0-i family]188-my family would consider it too frivolous — nouveau riche , as [they]188-my family described it . It was n’t the first or the last thing [[my]0-i family]188-my family and [I]0-i disagreed on — [I]0-i loved everything about the experience . The way the leather seats hugged [my]0-i ass . The fact that [flight attendants]190-flight attendants ’ skirts looked shorter and legs looked longer . Even [their]190-flight attendants attention was more flirtatious . [The blonde beauty assigned to this flight]191-the blonde beauty assigned to this flight dipped low to pour [my]0-i water and give [me]0-i a look down [her]191-the blonde beauty assigned to this flight blouse at [her]191-the blonde beauty assigned to this flight high , rounded breasts . [I]0-i appreciated the courtesy . If [I]0-i ’d been going back to [London]7-london under better circumstances , [I]0-i might have considered seeing if [her]191-the blonde beauty assigned to this flight attention to detail extended to [the bedroom]192-the bedroom . [I]0-i liked luxuriating in a blow job and [I]0-i had the feeling [Melanie]68-melanie would be happy to make it last as long as [I]0-i wanted . But even gripping [this beautiful woman]193-this beautiful woman ’s neck as [she]193-this beautiful woman buried [her]193-this beautiful woman face in [my]0-i lap was n’t going to improve [my]0-i day . [I]0-i glanced at [my]0-i watch . “ Thirty minutes to landing , [sir]1908-sir , ”[68-melanie] [Melanie]68-melanie said . It was a shame [I]0-i ’d miss out on [her]68-melanie . [I]0-i did n’t normally deprive [myself]0-i , but [I]0-i was n’t in [the right head space]194-the right head space . “ Can [I]0-i get [you]1908-sir anything else ? ”[0-i] “ No . [I]0-i ’m going to make a quick call . ”[0-i] [I]0-i needed to tell [[my]0-i sister]195-my sister [I]0-i was about an hour away . [I]0-i unclenched [my]0-i fingers from the soft , cream leather on the arm of the seat . It had been six hours since [I]0-i ’d learned of [[my]0-i grandfather]196-my grandfather ’s fall . [I]0-i did n’t often miss being in [London]7-london but it was times like these where [I]0-i wished [New York]8-new york was a forty - five - minute drive away from [[my]0-i family]188-my family . [I]0-i had to keep telling [myself]0-i that there was nothing [I]0-i could do for [[my]0-i grandfather]196-my grandfather whether [I]0-i was sitting next to [him]196-my grandfather by [his]196-my grandfather bed or here in the air . “ Have [you]0-i landed ? ”[69-darcy] [Darcy]69-darcy asked as [she]69-darcy answered [my]0-i call . “ Thirty minutes . ”[69-darcy] “ So [you]0-i ’ll be here in a little over an hour . Message [me]69-darcy just before [you]0-i arrive and [I]69-darcy ’ll come down and meet [you]0-i . ”[69-darcy] “ Why ? Is there something [you]0-i ’re not telling [me]69-darcy ? ”[69-darcy] Had [[my]0-i grandfather]196-my grandfather ’s condition deteriorated since [I]0-i ’d last spoken to [her]69-darcy ? “ No . [This hospital]1909-this hospital is just hard to navigate . ”[69-darcy] [She]69-darcy sounded tired , like [she]69-darcy ’d been up all night . [I]0-i ’d be able to relieve [her]69-darcy burden a little when [I]0-i arrived . “ Is [he]196-my grandfather conscious ? ”[0-i] [I]0-i asked , still unconvinced [she]69-darcy was telling [me]0-i the whole story . “ Yes . [He]196-my grandfather says [he]196-my grandfather ’s never felt better , but clearly breaking [your]0-i hip at eighty - two is n’t good . ”[69-darcy] [Her]69-darcy voice was tight . [She]69-darcy was holding [herself]69-darcy together . Keeping a stiff upper lip . “ [He]196-my grandfather ’s going to be fine . ”[69-darcy] This time . “ Have [you]69-darcy had the results of the CT yet ? ”[69-darcy] “ No . [You]69-darcy know it took [them]1910-them a couple of hours to convince [him]196-my grandfather to have it done . ”[69-darcy] The corners of [my]0-i mouth tried to tug into a smile without [my]0-i permission . [Darcy]69-darcy would hear the amusement in [my]0-i voice and be furious with [me]0-i for taking [his]200-his side . [Grandfather]70-grandfather was [an indomitable character]201-an indomitable character and there was little [anyone]202-anyone could persuade [him]70-grandfather to do if [he]70-grandfather did n’t want to . And vice versa , when [people]203-people told [him]70-grandfather [he]70-grandfather could n’t do something , [he]70-grandfather found a way . [We]204-we were a lot alike in that way . [He]70-grandfather was [[my]0-i hero]205-my hero when [I]0-i was young . And constantly made comments about [me]0-i running away to [America]12-america . Insults [I]0-i could have coped with . Two
